title: What does an accident mean in a dream?

preview.html: What does an accident in a dream mean? We can say that road accidents are one of the worst things that happen to people over time from all over the world, and this is due to several main reasons, the most important of which is that these accidents cause human and material damage, in addition to the fact that their spread threatens the lives of passers-by. It has been proven through studies and research that some dreams of an accident may represent their death or their torment to the Lord. Interpretation of an accident in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says in his book that seeing an accident in a dream means that you will hear bad news in the coming period. If the sleeper sees a car accident in his dream, this is a sign of his competition with his colleagues and that the dreamer will lose this competition. Seeing an accident in a dream indicates a change in the fortuneteller's circumstances, but this change will be for the worse. Ibn Sirin says that seeing an accident in a dream indicates the occurrence of bad events and incidents in the dreamer's life. If the sleeper sees in his dream an accident falling into the water, this is a sign of anxiety, tension and anxiety that the dreamer suffers from. If the sleeper sees in his sleep a car accident on a rough road, this is a sign that the dreamer will make many bad decisions in the coming period, and these decisions will lead to a deterioration in his situation. If the sleeper sees in a dream an accident between two cars, this is a sign of the problems, anxiety and sorrows that the dreamer suffers from. Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees a car accident in her dream, this is a sign that the dreamer is taking Many decisions that put her life at risk, and this vision indicates the loss that the dreamer will suffer. A girl's vision of a car accident in a girl's dream indicates that there are many differences between her and the person she loves, and this vision also shows the emotional differences that the dreamer is going through. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing an accident in a girl's dream indicates that there is a person who hates her, resents her, and wants to destroy her life. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she survived a car accident, this is a vision that predicts that she will get rid of the problems she faces in the near future. Surviving a car accident in a single girl's dream indicates the stability of her emotional life and marriage to the young man she loves. If an unmarried girl sees an overturned car in her dream, this means that the dreamer is in a hurry to make decisions and will have to think a lot before making any fateful decision. Interpretation of seeing an accident in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees a car accident in her dream, this is a sign that the dreamer cannot make any right decision in his life. Seeing a small accident in a married woman's dream means that she feels anxious and worried about some things in her life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she survived a car accident, this is a good vision It portends the death of the fears you suffer from. Seeing that you survived a car accident in a married woman’s dream indicates the payment of all debts. If a married woman sees in her dream that someone is in an accident, this is a sign of

title: Interpretation of seeing a haircut in a dream: I saw that I cut my hair in a dream

preview.html: Contents: Dream haircut for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for Imam al-Sadiq, for men, and for a lady shaving her hair. The meaning of cutting hair in a dream The fact that you cut your hair reflects your boldness or desire for a noticeable change in appearance If you dream that someone is cutting your hair, this may reflect your desire to change a certain aspect of your life and get rid of some old restrictions. If you dream that you are cutting your hair, this means that you are ready to make some radical and tough decisions about some prominent issues in your life. It may be superficial, such as a change in your appearance or surroundings, or it may reflect a deeper problem, such as a detailed change in your outlook on life or a certain relationship. Cutting hair in a dream is a reflection of the subconscious mind's desire to get rid of something that is hindering your progress. This issue may be related to yourself, such as your feelings or hesitation in your thoughts, or someone standing in the way of your growth. As such, it symbolizes a new beginning in which you want to get rid of unwanted aspects of your life or personality. A dream about cutting hair can arise from a sudden feeling of loss of strength or annoyance at harsh criticism that you consider completely unfair. Since in most cases, cutting hair is associated with a change in status, the more hair, the bigger and more radical the decision. Therefore, when you wake up, think about the true meaning of your subconscious mind that created this dream, and then you will be able to face your reality. Seeing hair in a dream for a married woman symbolizes fertility and childbirth or even a dream may indicate pregnancy in a married woman. Hair is associated in one way or another with a woman's femininity, while cutting in a dream indicates a stage in life in which there is no childbirth, in which the menstrual cycle may stop and the woman does not realize it. Pregnancy after that. The dream of cutting a married woman's hair is usually interpreted as good, so if a married woman sees that she looks more beautiful and radiant, she will be a happier and more successful woman. In many cases, it can often symbolize the divorce of a married woman, especially if she sees that her husband is having an affair with her. Cutting hair in a dream for a pregnant woman indicates the absence of pregnancy aches and pains, and cutting the hair of a pregnant woman indicates the birth of a girl, and short hair indicates a boy. As for if a pregnant woman dreams that her husband is cutting her hair, this dream indicates the collapse of all differences between them and that good luck awaits her in the future. One of the interpretations of the dream that you are cutting long hair shows that it symbolizes the loss of power and control in certain aspects of life. If you see in your dream that you are cutting your long hair, this means that you will lose your authority in a certain matter within the family or at work, and you will also lose your strength. Cutting long hair in a dream, according to some interpreters, symbolizes that in reality you are trying to make a new radical change in your life, whether emotionally or professionally. Cutting long hair in a dream means that you are trying to get rid of some bad habits and disturbing thoughts that worry you in reality. Cutting your hair in a dream symbolizes that you are trying

title: Interpretation of a dream about a sheikh for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a sheikh by Ibn Sirin: A sheikh in a dream by Ibn Sirin indicates that he is a person capable of performing the duties of the Islamic religion. Seeing a sheikh in a dream indicates the dreamer’s desire to benefit from knowledge. Seeing a sheikh in a dream indicates the death of misfortunes and worries. Whoever sees in a dream that he kisses an sheikh, this is evidence. On his good conduct and reputation. Seeing a sheikh in a dream who is unable to deliver information to people is evidence of illness and affliction. Seeing a sheikh in a dream can sometimes indicate longevity. Interpretation of a dream about Sheikh Nabulsi: Whoever sees in a dream that he is talking to the sheikh, this indicates that he is warning him Of the sins and transgressions that he commits. If the sheikh gives the fortuneteller in a dream water to drink, this indicates that the priest is a pious man who fears God. Seeing the sheikh in a dream indicates the religious power of the soothsayer. Seeing the sheikh in a dream is evidence of goodness and prestige. Seeing the person in the dream is addressing The sheikh, this is evidence of staying away from sins and transgressions. Seeing the sheikh in a dream can indicate happiness and joy. The words of the sheikh in the dream are a message from God Almighty to the pioneer. Seeing a person in a dream that he is taking milk from the sheikh indicates the purity of the heart. The interpretation of the dream of the sheikh for the single woman shows The sheikh in a girl’s dream indicates the goodness and happiness that she will find. Seeing an infidel sheikh in a dream is evidence of hostility. The sheikh in a girl’s dream indicates her marriage in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a sheikh for a married woman. Seeing a married sheikh in a dream indicates the good that she will get. Seeing a sheikh in a dream is evidence On a dream in the near future. The sheikh in a married woman’s dream is a sign of stability in married life. Seeing a married woman kissing the hand of a sheikh indicates that she is righteous. Interpretation of a dream about a sheikh for a man: If one sees in a dream an old man wearing white clothes, this indicates the presence of a person in His life will be his preacher. Seeing a man in a dream walking is showing patience and spending knowledge. Seeing an old man in a dream is evidence of good deeds. If one sees an old man sleeping in a dream, this is a sign of goodness that he will receive. Seeing an old man wearing white in a dream A place believed to see the oldest. The owners of white clothing is evidence On the dreamer’s closeness to God Almighty and his obedience to Him. The interpretation of this vision is considered positive for someone whose relationship with Almighty God is not good, and this is the starting point for a new relationship full of faith with God. This vision shows that the dreamer is loyal to his religion and family, honest in his treatment of all people, and always extends A helping hand. This vision suggests piety, faith, and a life full of peace for the dreamer. Seeing an old man in a dream for a pregnant woman. It was believed that seeing an old man in a dream. A pregnant woman is considered one of the biggest dreams of the dreaming woman, and she will be very happy with it. This vision shows that pregnant woman, God will soon bless her with a beautiful baby and she will be very happy with it. A pregnant woman must face all the problems of the mind and have patience, determination and determination. Seeing a sheikh, especially an elderly person, is evidence that the pregnant woman is healthy and alive.

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a raging sea for unmarried women according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream of a raging sea for a single woman. The raging sea in a vision is one of the things that scares a person and makes him feel disturbed and unstable. Interpretation of a dream of a raging sea for a single woman by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream of a raging sea for a single woman. The raging sea in a dream of an unmarried woman, according to most interpreters, is evidence of falling into forbidden things and committing Sins, and the dream may come to warn her. And if she finds him rebellious and extremely angry, but she manages to escape and survive, then the experts give her happy news that she will be freed from her sins and that God will accept her repentance, with His permission. As for her drowning in that sea, it is evidence of her closeness to evil people and their abundance. Her dealings with them bring many tragedies into her life. His stay can bring signs of getting rid of corrupt friends and deceitful lovers, that is, he discovers people for who they really are and cannot deceive them again. Some experts say that her escape from the high waves is an expression of the calmness of her life and her freedom from adversity. In addition to some happy events that you will experience, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about a raging sea for a single woman, according to Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin explains that the raging sea in a dream has many difficult interpretations, while escaping from it is a good omen for the girl to be happy and satisfied with several matters related to her life. It proves that seeing this The sea is evidence of many obstacles that she faces in her work or in her relationship with those around her. If a girl is afraid of seeing this flood and feels very afraid that it will come to her, then Ibn Sirin says that she is a good girl and always wants to stay away from temptations and escape sins. He warns not A married woman who sees strong sea waves in her vision, because it is a strong warning against some mistakes that she continues to make and does not give up, which causes her severe remorse after a while. The drowning of a virgin in it is evidence of the abundance of evil, following heresies and temptations, and the lack of fear of God, and from here it threatens her This dream indicates a lot of evil that you will be exposed to if you continue. Do it. An Egyptian site, the largest site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. All you have to do is write the Egyptian dream interpretation site on Google and get the correct interpretations. I dreamed of a rough sea of ​​single women. If a girl says that she dreamed of a rough sea, most interpreters refer to her as many Among the things that it is best to pay attention to, including the sins she commits and the negative habits she practices that may seriously affect her health, some say that the dream is a message to her about the necessity of following the Qur’an and Sunnah and resisting desires that lead to drowning in sins. Interpretation of a dream about the sea Raging and escaping from it for a single woman: When a girl runs away from the raging sea in her dream, most interpreters show the good that will come after this vision, except for the crises and sorrows that she goes through, and everything that disturbs her peace, except that this dream is a harbinger of success. She achieved great distinction in her field of work and saw great progress through it, which is likely to reach a group of people

title: Interpretation of hitting in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi

preview.html: Knocking in a dream is one of the dreams that carry a large number of interpretations, knowing that some of these interpretations are positive, contrary to what some expect. Today, through our website, we wanted to collect for you the most important interpretations and signals provided by great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen. Knocking in a dream from He sees in a dream that he is being beaten by someone who hates him in reality, then this is a sign that this person is planning a big conspiracy against him, so the dreamer must be more careful. Being beaten in a dream is clear evidence that the dreamer is occupying himself and his thoughts with useless things. As for someone who dreams of hitting others with shoes, this is an indication that the dreamer is treating those around him badly and is actually hurting them, and that he is generally an unpopular person in his social environment. Whoever sees in his dream that he is being beaten excessively and yet he does not feel the pain, the dream indicates It indicates that he will receive abundant money that guarantees the stability of the dreamer’s financial situation for a long time. Beating with a stick in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Beating in a dream by Ibn Sirin is one of the visions that carry a large number of interpretations, the most important of which is that the dreamer will obtain a lot of money, especially if the beating is in the abdomen, and here is the other mentioned. Interpretations. Whoever dreams that his stomach is atrophy due to excessive beatings on him, this is evidence that the dreamer will be exposed to a major shortage of money or good offspring. As for whoever sees that he is beating the beast, he is riding as a sign that he is exposed to a serious financial crisis and debts may be accumulating on his shoulders. Unnecessary beatings in a dream It is good news that the dreamer will be very happy in his life and, God willing, he will be able to achieve all his dreams. As for whoever dreams of being beaten by those around him, this indicates that those close to him never wish him well and are constantly planning to harm him. Ibn Sirin believes that beating In a dream, it is a sign that the dreamer will obtain a great benefit. Reaching the dream is a sign that the dreamer will be exposed to a large number of obstacles and obstacles on his way to achieving his dreams, but, God willing, he will be able to overcome them. Beating with a stick in a dream Al-Nabulsi The Nabulsi scholar indicated that beating with instruments Sharp is an indication that the dreamer’s life will be afflicted with misfortunes and misfortunes that he will find himself unable to face. Unnecessary beating in a dream, as interpreted by Imam Al-Nabulsi, is good evidence that the dreamer’s life will be filled with goodness and benefits, and God knows best. Al-Nabulsi believes that beating in a dream is a sermon and advised the dreamer to stay away from The path he is currently taking because it will bring him nothing but trouble. The dream also indicates the need for caution and attention on the part of those around the dreamer, and not to overly trust anyone. What is the interpretation of beating in a dream for a single woman? Beating an unmarried woman in a dream is a sign of That you will enter into a romantic relationship soon, in addition to a number of other interpretations, and here are the most important of them: If an unmarried woman sees that she was hit in the face but did not feel the blow, this means that she will suffer from the failure of a romantic relationship, but she will be able

title: Interpretation of washing hands in a dream for unmarried women according to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi.

preview.html: Interpretation of washing hands in a dream for a single woman According to the interpretation of Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi, washing hands is one of the things that a person does often during the day to maintain health and cleanliness, and a person often uses his hands. Therefore, he cares about their cleanliness, and seeing washing hands in a dream may carry connotations different from the connotations it carries in reality, and these connotations may be reflected in the personality of the viewer. Interpretation of a dream about seeing hands washing in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of Al-Nabulsi. Al-Nabulsi’s scholar believes that seeing a person washing his hands in a dream It indicates a dispute between the dreamer and his friends, and that the vision may indicate his escape from what frightens the dreamer in his life. Imam Nabulsi says that seeing the dreamer washing his hands in his dream, this vision indicates a loss of hope in achieving the things he seeks, and that this vision shows despair and inability. To persevere in the pursuit of it. Seeing oneself washing his hands in a dream may indicate repentance for the sins that the dreamer has committed in his life and that he seeks to return to the straight path. If the dreamer suffers from the problem of accumulating debts and sees in his dream that he is washing his hands, then this vision It warns him against getting rid of debts and paying them off. Seeing washing hands in a dream may indicate getting rid of the worries and sorrows that the dreamer is suffering from in his dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing washing hands with water and soap for an unmarried woman. Interpretation by Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says: If a girl dreams of being unmarried. A married woman dreams that she washes her hands with soap and the soap has a fragrant and distinctive smell. This vision indicates the stability of her family life and harmony with her and her family. Friends. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is washing her hands with white soap, then this vision indicates the purity of the girl and the purity of her heart, and that she has a good reputation among friends and relatives. If an unmarried woman suffers from an illness and sees in a dream that she is washing her hands with green soap, then this The vision portends her recovery from illness and that God will grant her health and well-being in her life. Seeing a girl washing her hands with water and soap in a girl’s dream could mean that she will get rid of the worries and problems that she suffers from in her life. In general, seeing an unmarried girl in her dream using soap to wash her hands, This vision is praiseworthy and promising and may indicate the earliest date of her engagement or marriage if she washes her entire body. Interpretation of a dream about washing hands for unmarried women: If an unmarried girl sees in her dream a hand washer, then this vision shows the girl’s interest in new things that will bring happiness and joy to her life and improve Her relationship with others around her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that the wash basin is broken, then this vision indicates her relationship with a person who will make her suffer from problems and pain, and this vision carries a warning to the girl about her relationship with others. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a girl sees in a dream a dirty and unclean washing machine, this is an unpleasant vision. And if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she

title: Interpretation of seeing clapping in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing applause in a dream. What I mean is applause in a dream. The person who sees the feeling of happiness and joy. It also expresses joy and acceptance from others and when celebrating graduation from the university. Seeing applause in a dream means profit and a rich source if the dreamer is a merchant. While the applause of one who claps his hands is evidence of joy and pleasure in his heart, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing clapping in a dream for a woman: seeing a free girl clapping because this is evidence of commitment and commitment in the last days. As for a married woman seeing her clapping her hands, this indicates that she heard good news that will make her heart and her family happy. Seeing a pregnant woman cheering in a dream is evidence of the possibility of comfort after fatigue and suffering, as well as The time of childbirth is approaching and the birth of a child that satisfies her heart. Interpretation of a dream about clapping in a dream for a divorced woman. Definitely check it. Clapping songs and musical tones are evidence that it does not bode well for her, and that she is committing sins and transgressions and she must repent. Look at her. Knock hard. This in a dream is evidence of knocking on her door, the door of joy, pleasure, and communication with someone. He protects her and cares for her, and God knows best. She dreams of seeing applause in a single woman’s dream. Seeing applause for a single girl is evidence of success and determination to achieve what she seeks, and may God grant her success. And when you see a single girl, clap your hands and cry, this is evidence of overcoming the problems and crises that she went through during this period. But if I saw an unmarried girl clapping her hands in her dream, then this is one of the good dreams that satisfies the heart and soul and spreads joy. Seeing her clapping her hands in her dream is evidence of a relationship with a person who knows God and has a good reputation and qualities. See singles clapping, and this indicates success, excellence, and overcoming crises and difficulties to achieve Dreams and ambitions. Interpretation of seeing clapping in a pregnant woman’s dream: Seeing a pregnant woman clapping in her dream is evidence that her due date is approaching and that she will have a healthy child and enjoy health and well-being. Seeing a pregnant woman clapping her hands is evidence that she has overcome the troubles and exhaustion that she was exposed to at that time and that Her condition is changing for the better, thanks to God. Interpretation of prolonged applause in a dream: Seeing prolonged applause in a dream indicates intense joy and a feeling of pleasure in the heart. And if you see a standing ovation, perhaps it warns of something that warns of the arrival of danger to the dreamer. Seeing a prolonged applause and hearing that in a dream is evidence that you are hearing happy news. From the dreamer and his family, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing people clapping for you in a dream: Seeing people gathering and applauding for you is evidence of success and excellence or achieving a great and prestigious position. Then, from the opinion of people clapping for you in a dream, this is evidence of their fame and intense love for you. It also indicates longevity. Age. The meaning of clapping hands in a dream. If he sees a man clapping his hands in his dream, this indicates that he will receive a lot of sustenance and kindness, and perhaps he will meet one of his relatives, and God knows best. And when a woman sees clapping in a dream, she will meet one of her relatives who is on a trip and she may meet a lover. Vision. A married woman clapping her hands in a dream means improvement

title: Interpretation of a dream about rosemary or rosemary in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing Rosemary means comfort, trust and other interpretations. We will interpret it for an unmarried girl, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, or a man, such as eating a rosemary, dreaming of planting a rosemary, or buying rosemary, according to Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi. And more in continuation of the matter: Interpretation of Rosemary in a dream. They symbolize the vision. Rosemary in a dream, or any of the green herbs, or any green crop from the earth, symbolizes goodness because it sends reassurance, calm, and comfort in the life of the dreamer. Rosemary is an aromatic plant, and Rosemary in a dream shows that sadness, unhappiness, and discord It will not reach homes that live in kindness, wealth and luxury. The vision of walking on a path of Rose Mary symbolizes the dreamer's path to reality, free of worries and problems. Sleeping on rosemary grass symbolizes asceticism and bliss for the pioneer, God willing. The Rose Mary or Atiqa group symbolizes the woman Kindness to a man. Seeing a burning Rosemary symbolizes grudges and people who harm him. Seeing an abundance of rosemary planted symbolizes the dreamer’s offspring and abundance in reality, God willing. Seeing a yellow Rosemary in a dream symbolizes difficulties in life and difficulties and problems to which the dreamer will be exposed. It symbolizes Yellow rosemary indicates illness, anxiety, and unhappiness. As for taking the rosemary out of the ground and getting rid of it, it symbolizes repentance and getting rid of problems, worries, and difficulties in the dreamer’s life, as it symbolizes cleansing the dreamer of his sins. To see yourself sitting on rosemary or sleeping on it symbolizes difficulties. And problems and symbolizes illness. Interpretation of Rosemary in one dream: To see a Rosemary in a dream, symbolizes goodness and the fulfillment of the desires of the dreamer. Seeing a Rosemary in a dream also symbolizes the dreamer’s ambition and clear goals. Seeing him walking over a Rosemary also symbolizes that he will obtain good Great, God willing. Likewise, sleeping over Rosemary suggests engagement or marriage. Interpretation of Rosemary in a married dream: Rosemary in a married woman’s house symbolizes the fulfillment of desires, and very good, God willing. It also symbolizes her success in family life or the short onset of pregnancy. Rosemary also symbolizes the patient's recovery and enjoyment of his health and well-being. Interpretation of Rosemary in a dream of a pregnant woman Rosemary in a dream of pregnancy symbolizes safety in pregnancy and childbirth, God willing. Eating Rosemary in a dream also indicates the cessation of anxiety, illness and sadness and the enjoyment of health, well-being and happiness. Interpretation of Rosemary In a man's dream, walking among rosemary or planting it in a dream symbolizes goodness, living, and happiness. Sitting on the head of a Rosemary also symbolizes the engagement of an unmarried young man. Likewise, seeing a man sleeping on a Rosemary symbolizes peace of mind and ridding him of problems and worries. Mary also A rose, accompanied by rain falling, brings many good things to the dreamer, God willing, and symbolizes an answer to prayer. A rose Mary in a dream is a type of Rose Mary and is one of the recurring visions for many people. Through our article we explained the interpretation of seeing a Rose Mary in a dream and the extent of its impact on reality. The fortune teller. Whether it is good a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about wristwatches in a dream is one of the dreams that lead to many different meanings and interpretations that warn or warn the dreamer in his life. The interpretation of the dream usually varies according to the condition and circumstances of the dream owner, as the interpretation of a dream about wristwatches for an unmarried girl is interpreted in a different sense than a dream for a woman. Married women, let us consider in this article the interpretations of seeing a dream about a wristwatch. Interpretation of a dream about wristwatches The interpretation of a dream about wristwatches in a dream explains the work of the fortuneteller and his research. Everything that is undesirable about a wristwatch in a dream indicates a problem in the dreamer’s life that causes him problems and vice versa. True. Seeing a wristwatch in a dream is evidence that he is waiting for something. He will see the time as he wants. This indicates that he will succeed in what he seeks and events will be as he plans. But if a person looks at the wristwatch in a dream and finds that the time is late, then he should reconsider. At work and the projects he undertakes. Looking at a stopped wristwatch in a dream also indicates delays in work. Broken wristwatches in a dream are undesirable and may indicate the imminent death of a woman from the dreamer’s family. As for dreaming of a wristwatch without a hand in a dream, it indicates Wasting time and losing the goal. A person must approach God and observe obedience. The vision may indicate skirmishes with relatives. While a narrow wrist watch in a dream is evidence of a lack of time or indicates a heavy burden, the opposite is true in the dream interpretation of a wide watch in a dream. Seeing yourself wearing more than one watch on your wrist in a dream is a sign that you are traveling to find work and earn a living. Interpretation of a dream about a wristwatch by Ibn Sirin If the dreamer buys a watch in a dream, this is a sign of kindness and also the fulfillment of desires and a change in the dreamer’s life for the better. If he buys The dreamer has a silver watch in his dream, then this is a sign of his righteousness and closeness to his Lord. If the wrist watch in the dream is black, this indicates the return of the absent person or the return of the beloved to the one he loves after a long separation that lasted many years. If a person sees that he lost his watch in a dream, then this vision It indicates that bad things will happen and things that cause distress and sadness. If the watches in the dream are beautiful, this indicates the coming of happiness and stability in the dreamer’s life in general. But if the watch is in bad condition in the dream, this is a sign of bad news, trouble and illness. Interpretation website Dreams on the Internet is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world. Just write Dream Interpretation Site on the Internet. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Dream interpretation of watches for single women. A wristwatch in an unmarried woman’s dream is a sign of a future commitment in her life and may soon indicate marriage or marriage. Engaging in work or beginning a new educational stage. Interpretation of a dream about golden watches for unmarried women indicates kindness and benefit. A golden wristwatch in an unmarried woman’s dream also indicates her future marriage, where stability and comfort will prevail. Buying a wristwatch indicates

title: Interpretation of seeing a cat in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: A cat in a dream: It is a recurring dream and carries many interpretations, according to what the great dream interpreters such as Ibn Sirin and Ibn Shaheen said. Seeing cats in a dream usually indicates that the dreamer will face a series of crises and difficulties in his life, and today through our website we will discuss the complete interpretation of seeing cats for each of the men. And women according to marital status. A cat in a dream. Selling cats in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will lose a lot of money in the coming period or that he will spend his money on things that will not bring any benefit to his life and will only lead to bankruptcy. A cat in a dream is a sign that the owner of the vision He lives a very unsafe and unstable life. Seeing cats entering the house is a sign that the house is being robbed or the dreamer is surrounded by hypocrites and he should be as careful as possible. Cats in a dream indicate that the dreamer is surrounded by envious eyes and that bad luck will be his companion. A hungry cat in The dream is not a promising dream at all, it indicates that the dreamer will be exposed to poverty and need and live in a state of distress for a long time. A male cat in a woman’s dream is a symbol of femininity, so she is surrounded by greed. Crying cats in a dream is an unpleasant dream, as it indicates That the dreamer will be exposed to a large number of problems, in addition to the fact that the next few days will bring him a series of unpleasant news that will lead to a bad psychological state. The cat in a dream by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing cats in a dream is a clear sign that the dreamer will live a negative life. , especially if the cat is not a pet, and here are the other interpretations he indicated: A cat in a dream is a sign that the dreamer will suffer from an illness or that he will suffer from a series of psychological problems that require him to go to a psychiatrist as soon as possible. Seeing cats in A dream and fear of it indicates the outbreak of many disputes in the dreamer’s life, especially with those close to him, knowing that he will not be able to deal with such problems. Seeing a group of kittens in a dream is a good omen for receiving a series of good news in the coming period, which It will improve the psychological state of the dreamer. While seeing a cat in a dream is an indication that the dreamer enjoys good luck, and that God Almighty will be able to achieve all his goals. Seeing unruly cats generally symbolizes that the dreamer is surrounded by people who seek to harm him in any way and regardless About the cost, as hatred controls their alkalinity. A cat bite in a dream is a clear sign that the dreamer will face a number of problems, in addition to being exposed to a health problem. A cat in a dream for single peopleIf an unmarried girl sees that she is raising a group of kittens in the room of her house, this is evidence However, this girl will go through a wide range of problems, and God Almighty will remain by her side until he gets rid of her. Seeing cats in a dream and looking at the dreamer for a long time is evidence that he is facing a set of problems, and the dreamer must be rational enough to
